duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting the customer and commercial team members in selecting the right product for customer applications and troubleshooting existing equipment.
Identifying customer product needs, while increasing sales revenue by recommending appropriate products, equipment, and solutions.
Providing technical pre-sale and post-sale support to global sales channels and international customer networks.
Participating in root cause analysis, process improvement, and attending vendor and department meetings for continued learning including product training.
Responsible for providing product documentation support as needed and performing sales support activities such as entering orders, providing quotes and pricing, expediting orders.
Ensuring national security requirements and export compliance of all transactions, including end-user screening and use of products to adhere to technology restrictions.
Measuring and reporting on the performance of sales activities and technical support, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an accredited higher learning institution in science (Physics, Chemistry, Biology, or a related scientific/engineering major) or a combination of education and experience is required.
